info.name: Ionos Global Navigation
info.summary: IONOS Global Navigation (evaluation, not ready for production use)
info.description:
The IONOS Global Navigation is a unified header across all IONOS applications. The global navigation serves as part of the corporate identity of IONOS as it can be recognized across all products. Depending on the authentication type users can jump between products.
NOTE: This app was created only for evaluation purposes and is not considered production ready!
info.author: Thomas Lehmann
